description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the reason for the Failsafe Alert.

display.value: Missing Health Visiting Service - Individual has a missing association with a Health Visiting Service
Missing CHO Service - Individual has a missing association with a CHO Service
Missing GP Service - Individual has a missing association with a GP Service
Missing Maternity Service - Individual has a missing association with a Maternity Service
Missing School Nursing Service - Individual has a missing association with a School Nursing Service
Incorrect Health Visiting Service - Individual has an incorrect association with a Health Visiting Service based on their latest address
Incorrect CHO Service - Individual has an incorrect association with a CHO Service based on their latest address
Incorrect CHO Service - Individual has an incorrect association with a CHO Service based on their GP registration
